import { CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA, Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterLink } from '@angular/router'; import { IonicModule } from '@ionic/angular'; import { register } from 'swiper/element/bundle'; register() @Component({ selector: 'app-walkthrough', templateUrl: './walkthrough.component.html', styleUrls: ['./walkthrough.component.scss'], standalone: true, imports: [ IonicModule, RouterLink ], schemas: [ CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA, ] }) export class WalkthroughComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() {} }

Taking you to the Cloud

We have no change wahalas and want you to experience this joy too
